body: Per discussion with @agl, this is the first time we've seen a certificate that is malformed in this particular way, so we're not going to rush into relaxing the requirements. If you can give us more context about what software (erroneously) generated that certificate and how common the problem might be, that would help us decide what to do for Go 1.7. Adam is thinking about scanning through the Certificate Transparency logs to see if there are more there. Thanks.
